title: Housekeeper stands on the ledge of a high-rise apartment block to clean the windows
text:
A young woman was caught on camera balancing precariously on a ledge as she cleaned the outside of a high-rise flat's window.

The footage was filmed by a pedestrian on street level in Cramer Avenue in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

In the video, the cameraman zooms in to focus on the young woman who has clambered on to a ledge outside of a windowpane.

She is wearing what appears to be a black and white checkered uniform as she reaches precariously across to the far side of the glass.

There is a small metal bar running along the ledge at her ankle height but there is no other form of support to stop her losing her balance.

In the background, the traffic on the busy street below can be heard whirring past as one woman is heard saying: 'She is crazy!'

The footage was filmed by a pedestrian on street level in Cramer Avenue in Buenos Aires, Argentina, to show a woman who has clambered on to a ledge on the outside of a windowpane

She leans precariously to reach the far side of the pane of glass with only a small metal bar at her ankle height for support

As the cameraman zooms out once again he exposes that she is working on what appears to be the seventh floor of the building.

He continues to show the busy surroundings and the video ends shortly after.

The video was originally posted on Twitter by Sergio Ucedo, where it has been viewed 335,000 times.

He uploaded the footage with the caption: 'I have no words.'

As the cameraman zooms out once again he exposes that she is working on what appears to be the seventh floor of the building

In the background, the traffic on the busy street below can be heard whirring past as one woman is heard saying: 'She is crazy'

Reports said that she was wearing a uniform commonly used by housekeepers in the area.

Social media users were quick to criticise the cleaner's presumed employers.

ManoloLamothe wrote on Twitter: 'She is wearing a housekeeper's uniform, her boss should be reported to the local authorities.'

Anotehr user, Deilalil28, added: 'I am suffering from vertigo watching her. The employers should be reported.'
description: The footage was filmed by a pedestrian on street level in Cramer Avenue in  Buenos Aires, Argentina. The woman leans precariously with only a small metal bar at ankle height for support.
